0.05.name: wordpress/simple-download-monitor
0.05.description: I wrote Simple Download Monitor because I wanted to monitor the number of downloads of my files without having to maintain any kind of database or making any special download links. I just wanted to upload a file to a designated directory using FTP, provide a direct link to it and once in a while check the number of downloads. And this is pretty much what Simple Download Monitor does, with some slight additions, such as recording referers and username of people who download my files.
